subject: Quote request
body:
Hi Alex,

Please quote a foam insert with these specs:

Overall / outside foam size: 18 x 12 x 3 in
Quantity: 250 pcs
Material: EPE foam
Density: 1.7#

This is made up of (3) layers, each 18 x 12:
- Layer 1 (bottom): thickness 1.0 in
- Layer 2 (middle): thickness 1.0 in — this layer has the cavities
- Layer 3 (top): thickness 1.0 in

Cavities (in Layer 2):
- 2 cavities total
- Cavity A: 4 x 3 x 1 in
- Cavity B: Ø2.5 x 1 in
- Also add 1 through-hole: Ø1.0 x 3 in

Thanks,
Chuck Johnson
Chuck Co.
(555) 222-1111
chuck@example.com
